detectors.description:
Federation_v1.voteTransaction(address,address,uint256,string,bytes32,bytes32,uint32,uint8,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#352-386) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- transactionCount >= required && transactionCount >= members.length / 2 + 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#377)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(members.length - 1 >= required,Federation: Can't have less than required members)

detectors.description:
Federation_v1.removeMember(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#434-450) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool,string)(members.length - 1 >= required,Federation: Can't have less than required members) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#439)
	- i < members.length - 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#442)
	- members[i] = members[members.length - 1] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#444)
	- members.length -= 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#448)
detectors.markdown:
[Federation_v1.removeMember(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#L434-L450) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [require(bool,string)(members.length - 1 >= required,Federation: Can't have less than required members)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#L439)
	- [i < members.length - 1](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#L442)
	- [members[i] = members[members.length - 1]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#L444)
	- [members.length -= 1](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#L448)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Federation_v1.voteTransaction(address,address,uint256,string,bytes32,bytes32,uint32,uint8,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#352-386):
	External calls:
	- acceptTransfer = bridge.acceptTransfer(originalTokenAddress,receiver,amount,symbol,blockHash,transactionHash,logIndex,decimals,granularity) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#379)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Executed(transactionId) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Federation_v1.sol#381)
